PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData:
<CustomProps><BindingConfiguration vt="8"><binding name="basicHttpBinding"><security mode="TransportCredentialOnly"><transport clientCredentialType="Windows" /></security></binding></BindingConfiguration><InboundBodyPathExpression vt="8" /><OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation><AffiliateApplicationName vt="8" /><EnableTransaction vt="11">-1</EnableTransaction><StaticAction vt="8"><BtsActionMapping xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
                    <Operation Name="SubmitMessage" Action="http://MyServices/SubmitMessage" />
                    </BtsActionMapping></StaticAction><BindingType vt="8">basicHttpBinding</BindingType><ProxyAddress vt="8" /><UserName vt="8" /><InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation><EndpointBehaviorConfiguration vt="8"><behavior name="EndpointBehavior"><clientCredentials><windows allowedImpersonationLevel="Impersonation" /></clientCredentials></behavior></EndpointBehaviorConfiguration><OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate><PropagateFaultMessage vt="11">-1</PropagateFaultMessage><InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding><ProxyUserName vt="8" /><IsolationLevel vt="8">Serializable</IsolationLevel><UseSSO vt="11">0</UseSSO></CustomProps>

SendPort.Name: MQSeries - $(QueueManager1)
SendPort.Filter: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <Filter xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Group> <Statement Property="BTS.Operation" Operator="0" Value="SendRequest" /> <Statement Property="Schemas.PropertySchemas.QueueManager" Operator="0" Value="$(QueueManager1)" /> <Statement Property="Schemas.PropertySchemas.Queue" Operator="0" Value="BIZ.REQ.A" /> <Statement Property="Schemas.PropertySchemas.Platform" Operator="0" Value="CP-NRT" /> </Group> </Filter>

PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData:
<CustomProps><OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate><PropagateFaultMessage vt="11">-1</PropagateFaultMessage><ProxyUserName vt="8" /><EndpointBehaviorConfiguration vt="8"><behavior name="customBehaviorForCert"><clientCredentials><clientCertificate findValue="$(NWServiceHostingCert)" storeLocation="LocalMachine" x509FindType="FindBySubjectName" /><serviceCertificate><defaultCertificate findValue="$(HostingCert)" storeLocation="LocalMachine" storeName="TrustedPeople" x509FindType="FindBySubjectName" /><authentication certificateValidationMode="PeerOrChainTrust" revocationMode="NoCheck" trustedStoreLocation="LocalMachine" /></serviceCertificate></clientCredentials></behavior></EndpointBehaviorConfiguration><OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation><StaticAction vt="8"><BtsActionMapping xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
                    </BtsActionMapping></StaticAction><BindingConfiguration vt="8"><binding name="BATCHBINDING" closeTimeout="$(InitialSendTimeout)" openTimeout="$(InitialSendTimeout)" receiveTimeout="$(InitialSendTimeout)" sendTimeout="$(InitialSendTimeout)" ><security defaultAlgorithmSuite="Basic128Rsa15" allowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply="true" authenticationMode="MutualCertificate" requireDerivedKeys="false" messageProtectionOrder="SignBeforeEncrypt" messageSecurityVersion="WSSecurity10WSTrust13WSSecureConversation13WSSecurityPolicy12BasicSecurityProfile10"><secureConversationBootstrap /></security><textMessageEncoding messageVersion="Soap11" /><httpTransport authenticationScheme="Negotiate" keepAliveEnabled="false" /></binding></BindingConfiguration><InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding><UseSSO vt="11">0</UseSSO><ProxyAddress vt="8" /><AffiliateApplicationName vt="8" /><BindingType vt="8">customBinding</BindingType><InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation><UserName vt="8" /><Identity vt="8"><identity>
                    <dns value="$(HostingCert)" />
                    </identity></Identity><InboundBodyPathExpression vt="8" /></CustomProps>

SendPort.Name: BinaryRequestPort - $(QueueManager2)
SendPort.Filter: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <Filter xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Group> <Statement Property="BTS.Operation" Operator="0" Value="SendRequest" /> <Statement Property="Schemas.PropertySchemas.QueueManager" Operator="0" Value="$(QueueManager2)" /> <Statement Property="Schemas.PropertySchemas.Queue" Operator="0" Value="host.out.oth.h2s" /> </Group> </Filter>

ReceiveLocation.Name: ImmediatePaymentFromSap:WCF
ReceiveLocation.ReceiveLocationTransportTypeData:
<CustomProps><InboundBodyPathExpression vt="8" /><InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation><BindingConfiguration vt="8"><binding name="SAPBATCHBINDING" closeTimeout="00:10:00" openTimeout="00:10:00" sendTimeout="00:10:00"><security defaultAlgorithmSuite="Basic128Rsa15" allowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply="true" authenticationMode="MutualCertificate" requireDerivedKeys="false" messageProtectionOrder="SignBeforeEncrypt" messageSecurityVersion="WSSecurity10WSTrust13WSSecureConversation13WSSecurityPolicy12BasicSecurityProfile10"><secureConversationBootstrap /></security><textMessageEncoding messageVersion="Soap11"><readerQuotas maxDepth="32" maxStringContentLength="8192" maxArrayLength="16384" maxBytesPerRead="4096" maxNameTableCharCount="16384" /></textMessageEncoding><httpTransport authenticationScheme="Anonymous" proxyAuthenticationScheme="Negotiate" /></binding></BindingConfiguration><OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate><CredentialType vt="8">None</CredentialType><Identity vt="8"><identity>
                        <dns value="$(NWServiceHostingCert)" />
                        </identity></Identity><ServiceBehaviorConfiguration vt="8"><behavior name="customSapBehaviorForCert"><serviceMetadata httpGetEnabled="true" /><serviceCredentials><clientCertificate><certificate findValue="$(SAPServiceHostingCert)" storeName="TrustedPeople" x509FindType="FindBySubjectName" /><authentication certificateValidationMode="PeerOrChainTrust" revocationMode="$(ImmediatePaymentFromSapRevocationMode)" /></clientCertificate><serviceCertificate findValue="$(NWServiceHostingCert)" x509FindType="FindBySubjectName" /></serviceCredentials><serviceThrottling maxConcurrentCalls="200" maxConcurrentSessions="200" maxConcurrentInstances="200" /></behavior></ServiceBehaviorConfiguration><OrderedProcessing vt="11">0</OrderedProcessing><IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults vt="11">-1</IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults><AffiliateApplicationName vt="8" /><DisableLocationOnFailure vt="11">0</DisableLocationOnFailure><SuspendMessageOnFailure vt="11">0</SuspendMessageOnFailure><BindingType vt="8">customBinding</BindingType><UserName vt="8" /><InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding><EndpointBehaviorConfiguration vt="8"><behavior name="EndpointBehavior" /></EndpointBehaviorConfiguration><OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation></CustomProps>
